Package com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.hbase.bulkload

Contains the classes required to bulk load data into HBase.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BulkLoadMapper Mapper for loading large amounts of data into Honeycomb format.
FieldParser Parser for reading data from string into byte string according to the column type.
PoolHTableProvider Provider of HTables from a pool.
RowParser Parser to turn CSV lines into Honeycomb rows
 

Enum Summary
BulkLoadMapper.Counters Counters for the map / reduce job.
 

Package com.nearinfinity.honeycomb.hbase.bulkload Description

Contains the classes required to bulk load data into HBase.
